[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@visualization-tools/core](./core.md) &gt; [IChartUpdateOptions](./core.ichartupdateoptions.md)

## IChartUpdateOptions interface

Options for how to update plots, like whether updating one plot requires updating all other plots.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IChartUpdateOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [interactionRollupTime](./core.ichartupdateoptions.interactionrolluptime.md) | number | How long to wait after a draw before beginning updating the plot(s) interaction handlers. Default 500 ms. |
|  [updateAllPlotsOnDraw](./core.ichartupdateoptions.updateallplotsondraw.md) | boolean | When one plot is drawn, should all others be redrawn? This is not necessary for a canvas renderer, or where a gl context is created with <code>preserveDrawingBuffer</code>. |
|  [updateDimsOnDraw](./core.ichartupdateoptions.updatedimsondraw.md) | boolean | On each draw should the viewport be adjusted to reflect the dimensions of the canvas? Where your application provides hooks for resize, this can be disabled for a minor performance win. |
